revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix

|brand = SolidRun |model = CuBox |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88AP510;88AP5-BJV2, (ARMADA 500) Dove; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM v7 |cpu1_type_rev = (PJ4 core) |cpu1spd = 800 <!-- 800 / 1000 MHz --> |gpu1chip1 = Vivante;GC600; |gpu1_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |gpu1_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS,x86-64,PowerPC, --> |gpu1_type_rev = <!-- GPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |gpu1spd = <!-- gpu speed, MHz, GHz, Leave blank if unknown --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = Serial NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;N25Q032A; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ2G63BFR-H9C; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1318; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:50:43
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2009.08;Marvell v5.4.4 NQ; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = eSATA, USB 2.0, MicroSD, HDMI |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = 1 |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = <!-- VDC,VAC, or POE, --> |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, USB Female Micro-B,, console,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI, S/PDIF, IrDA, Micro SD Card slot, RTC w/ battery, eSATA |addchip = Low-Power 3D HDMI Transmitter;NXP;TDA19988BHN;;1;,,, USB to Serial Bridge Controller;Prolific Technology;PL-2303HX;;1;,,, I2C Programmable CMOS Clock Generator & VCXO;Silicon Labs;Si5351;;1;,,, 1MHz Dual Step-down Regulator;Marvell;88PG8227;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Android, Ubuntu
|availability = common |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 01/2012 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Israel
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== By default comes with a 2GB microSD card dual-booting Android and Ubuntu. :Began shipping in January, 2012.
{{See also|SolidRun|List of SBCs}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88AP510 @800MHz ARM v7 (PJ4 core) *GPU: ''Vivante GC600'' (OpenGL 3.0, OpenGL ES 2.0, OpenVG) *Storage: 4MB Serial NOR Flash, eSATA port, :TF card (max.64GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 2x USB 2.0 (Host) ports *Power: 5V/2A via barrel
==Links of Interest== *[[Wikipedia:CuBox]]
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:SolidRun CuBox Top.jpeg|Board top File:SolidRun CuBox Bottom.jpeg|Board bottom File:SolidRun CuBox Front.jpeg|Front view File:SolidRun CuBox Back.jpeg|Back view </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
